usefulItems: bowl, paper towel, sealable container, refrigerator
title: Dairy free tzatziki

ingredients.content: 5 sprigs fresh mint, leaves only (approx. 15 g)

preparations.content: Place a bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh cashews into it. Cover cashews with water and set aside to soak overnight.
Using simmering basket, rinse and drain cashews. Transfer cashews back into bowl and set aside.
Place mint and cucumber into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer onto paper towel, squeeze to remove excess liquid and set aside.
Place garlic, drained cashews, coconut, lime juice, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 10<b> or until combined.
Add reserved cucumber and mint and combine <b>2 sec/î€ƒ/speed 3<b>. Serve immediately or transfer into a sealable container and place into refrigerator until ready to use (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: To increase the nutritional benefit, add 1 tablespoon acidophilus (available at most chemists and health food stores) when adding garlic.
You can store tzatziki in a sealable container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
